creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of shelves in a kitched with Crock Pot, blender, waffle iron, basket, napkins, and empty bottles of Busch beer and Orange Crush in paper cartons; same room as in image titled, "Pantry Shelf, Ruth's Home, Pomona Road, Ann Arbor, MI", but slightly different vantage point (.55); nearly idential to .64 (cropped slightly differently)
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LEONARD
title: Pantry Shelf, Ruth's Home, Pomona Road, Ann Arbor, MI [?]
